title: What could have increased the Qs of apple juice

content.prompt: Assume that apple juice and grape juice are substitutes. Which of the following will cause an increase in the quantity of apple juice supplied?

choices.label: A decrease in subsidies to apple juice producers
A decrease in the price of grape juice
An increase in the price of apple juice
An increase in the price of insecticides used on apple trees
The imposition of a price ceiling in the market for apple juice

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
